title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti according to package instructions.
Whisk eggs and cheese together in a bowl.
Combine pasta, pancetta, and egg mixture.
Serve with black pepper and extra cheese.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices for 1 hour.
Prepare the sauce by cooking onions, garlic, and tomato puree.
Add grilled chicken and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in heavy cream and serve hot.
